feels.name: Anger
feels.quote: Ahab would mutter to himself, as after poring over his charts till long after midnight he would throw himself back in reveriesâ€”tallied him, and shall he escape?

feels.name: Fear
feels.quote: A wild cry would be heard through the ship; and with glaring eyes Ahab would burst from his state room, as though escaping from a bed that was on fire.

feels.name: Torment
feels.quote: God help thee, old man, thy thoughts have created a creature in thee; and he whose intense thinking thus makes him a Prometheus; a vulture feeds upon that heart for ever; that vulture the very creature he creates.

Places.name: Ahab_s_cabin
Places.description: A room where Ahab studies sea charts and plans his hunt for Moby Dick.

Places.name: State_room
Places.description: A room where Ahab experiences intense dreams and bursts out in fear.
